original_text: And if ye shall despise my statutes, or if your soul abhor my judgments, so that ye will not do all my commandments, but that ye break my covenant:
korean_text: 내 규례를 멸시하며 마음에 내 법도를 싫어하여 내 모든 계명을 준행하지 아니하며 내 언약을 배반할진대

sentences.original_text: And if ye shall despise my statutes,
or if your soul abhor my judgments,
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 너희 영혼이 나의 심판을 혐오하여,

sentences.original_text: so that ye will not do all my commandments,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 나의 모든 계명을 행하지 아니하면,

sentences.original_text: but that ye break my covenant:
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 언약을 파기하는 것이 될 경우:
